participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, loves trying new things and enjoys the outdoors.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i am a huge coffee lover. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and creative, loves animals and is always looking to help others.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

content.text: Hey! How is your day? I like to go mountain bike and listen to pink.
